data.name: 0000 (093.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi, there's been something about your behavior I've often wondered about.

data.name: 0001 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hm? Which part?

data.name: 0002 (093.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're far more strict with me compared to the other SOS Brigade members, aren't you?

data.name: 0003 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you talking about Kyon? That's kind of a strange thing to say.

data.name: 0004 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When have I ever thought little of you? Tell me.

data.name: 0005 (093.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It always feels like you're working me hard—making me do all sorts of chores and whatnot.

data.name: 0006 (093.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Actually, you're definitely working me to the bone!

data.name: 0007 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's just because that kind of work is a perfect fit for you. Isn't that right?

data.name: 0008 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Anyway, even doing chores is respectable work. Someone has to get them done, after all.

data.name: 0009 (093.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Be that as it may… why does it have to be me?

data.name: 0010 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What? You still got a problem with it?

data.name: 0011 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then you'd better up your game as a member of the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0012 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Before you get to complain like that.

data.name: 0013 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you can do that much, then I might actually listen. Just listening is all I'll promise, though.

data.name: 0014 (093.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In other words, you just don't feel like listening to me in the first place, do you…

data.name: 0015 (093.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Despite everything you say, Suzumiya…

data.name: 0016 (093.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …you do rely on Kyon a fair amount.

data.name: 0017 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh?!

data.name: 0018 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru, why the heck are you making it sound like that all of a sudden?!

data.name: 0019 (093.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: B-but you always seem to care about him and stuff…

data.name: 0020 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Listen here, Mikuru. You've got it all wrong.

data.name: 0021 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Sure, I keep a close eye on what he's getting up to—I'll give you that.

data.name: 0022 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But that's purely supervision, okay? Supervision!!

data.name: 0023 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He's unmotivated and lacking in guts. Not to mention his rampant pessimism.

data.name: 0024 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Despite the fact that he was hand-picked to be a member of our prestigious SOS Brigade…

data.name: 0025 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Absolutely pathetic!

data.name: 0026 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, maybe it's just a matter of circumstance…

data.name: 0027 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But Kyon is a part of the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0028 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: To put it simply—as the brigade chief…

data.name: 0029 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's my responsibility to supervise Kyon!

data.name: 0030 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You got that Mikuru?!

data.name: 0031 (093.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes. I understand how you feel about Kyon.

data.name: 0032 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ughh~ I get the feeling you still don't get it.

data.name: 0033 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You know what, Mikuru? Sit down over here.

data.name: 0034 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I need you to understand just a little bit more.

data.name: 0035 (093.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh?! Y-you mean now?

data.name: 0036 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When else do you think? Now means now.

data.name: 0037 (093.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehhhh! P-please nooo!

data.name: 0038 (093.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I have been considering your relationship with him.

data.name: 0039 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh? Yuki, what do you mean, "relationship"?

data.name: 0040 (093.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It is difficult to view your correspondence with him as…

data.name: 0041 (093.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …fully amiable.

data.name: 0042 (093.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: But depending on the circumstance, I sense a trust that you don't have in other humans.

data.name: 0043 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yuki, I think you're misunderstanding.

data.name: 0044 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In a way, I'm sort of like Kyon's guardian, you know?

data.name: 0045 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He's unmotivated and always tries to take the easy way out of things…

data.name: 0046 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm just educating him.

data.name: 0047 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon's position in the SOS Brigade is like an apprentice or trainee.

data.name: 0048 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So it's guidance—what he needs is guidance.

data.name: 0049 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If the way I treat Kyon seems rough sometimes, then that's definitely why.

data.name: 0050 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So? Understood?

data.name: 0051 (093.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0052 (093.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya, you seem to always give him a heavy workload, wouldn't you say?

data.name: 0053 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Who, Kyon? I'm not exactly going out of my way to give him tons of work or anything.

data.name: 0054 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The only things I can trust him with are odd jobs.

data.name: 0055 (093.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Odd jobs they may be—he's always the one who ends up being entrusted with those things.

data.name: 0056 (093.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Therefore, he must be an important person to the SOS Brigade and, by consequence, to you.

data.name: 0057 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, I guess you can probably also look at it that way.

data.name: 0058 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nevertheless, he complains at every opportunity he gets.

data.name: 0059 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Always acting like everything's a massive bother.

data.name: 0060 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So I'm correcting his withered determination for him.

data.name: 0061 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's kind of how it is.

data.name: 0062 (093.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. So in a way, you're kind of like his guardian, right?

data.name: 0063 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yes! That's it!

data.name: 0064 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm kind of like Kyon's guardian, or teacher, or coach, or…

data.name: 0065 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well whatever, that kind of thing!

data.name: 0066 (093.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's our Koizumi, hitting the nail on the head.

data.name: 0067 (093.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I am honored to receive your praise.
